summary: A documentary film crew takes a look at the inspiration behind artist John Bolton's painting.
cast: John O'Mahony|Marcus Brigstocke|Carolyn Backhouse|Jonathan Ross|Tree Petts|John Bolton|Judith Clute|Jayne Nelson|Denise Worme|Betti Marenko|Katie Lawrie|Martin Cordier|Suzanne Barbieri|Steve Jones|Steve Jones
title: A Short Film About John Bolton
